rooms.description: Spacious area incorporating Vastu alignment with east and north orientations for energy flow, integrating a central courtyard view.
Functional kitchen adjacent to living space, with natural light and ventilation. Designed for energy efficiency.
Dedicated swimming pool area integrated with landscaping for relaxation.
Space for utilities and equipment maintenance, positioned to avoid disturbing the main living areas.

openings.description: Main entrance designed with a traditional Indian archway, ensuring positive energy flow according to Vastu.
Large windows providing ample daylight and cross ventilation, aligned with north-east for maximum benefits.
